title: Turkey-Free Thanksgiving Recipes: Celebrate Your Thanksgiving Even When You Do Not Have Any Turkey
description: We all have the perception that thanksgiving is mostly about having a turkey on the table and being thankful for your life. But with respect to the old tradition, you can enjoy and celebrate your thanksgiving without any turkey on your table. Many people cannot afford a turkey during thanksgiving. This book will show you how you can still celebrate your precious thanksgiving with your loved ones, with alternative thanksgiving recipes that are turkey-free. All of these turkey-free recipes are somehow will connect you to the vibe of thanksgiving, so donâ€™t be sad that you are leaving turkey behind this year!
author: Stephanie Sharp
